entries.name: DESCRIPTION
entries.desc: Description of this generator

entries.name: GENERATOR_DIR
entries.desc:
Path to this file's parent directory. Used to find templates and other
resources.

entries.name: SVNID_PATTERN
entries.desc: %q$Id: darkfish.rb 52 2009-01-07 02:08:11Z deveiant $“

entries.name: VERSION
entries.desc: Release Version

entries.name: asset_rel_path
entries.desc: The relative path to style sheets and javascript.  By default this is set the same as the rel_prefix.

entries.name: base_dir
entries.desc: The path to generate files into, combined with --op from the options for a full path.

entries.name: classes
entries.desc: Classes and modules to be used by this generator, not necessarily displayed.  See also modsort

entries.name: dry_run
entries.desc: No files will be written when #dry_run is true.

entries.name: file_output
entries.desc: When false the generate methods return a String instead of writing to a file.  The default is true.

entries.name: files
entries.desc: Files to be displayed by this generator

entries.name: json_index
entries.desc: The JSON index generator for this Darkfish generator

entries.name: methods
entries.desc: Methods to be displayed by this generator

entries.name: modsort
entries.desc: Sorted list of classes and modules to be displayed by this generator

entries.name: outputdir
entries.desc: The output directory

entries.name: store
entries.desc: The RDoc::Store that is the source of the generated content

entries.name: new(store, options)
entries.desc: Initialize a few instance variables before we start

entries.name: assemble_template(body_file)
entries.desc: Creates a template from its components and the body_file.

entries.name: class_dir()
entries.desc: Directory where generated class HTML files live relative to the output dir.

entries.name: copy_static()
entries.desc: Copies static files from the static_path into the output directory

entries.name: debug_msg(*msg)
entries.desc: Output progress information if debugging is enabled

entries.name: file_dir()
entries.desc: Directory where generated class HTML files live relative to the output dir.

entries.name: gen_sub_directories()
entries.desc: Create the directories the generated docs will live in if they don't already exist.

entries.name: generate()
entries.desc: Build the initial indices and output objects based on an array of TopLevel objects containing the extracted information.

entries.name: generate_class(klass, template_file = nil)
entries.desc: Generates a class file for klass

entries.name: generate_class_files()
entries.desc: Generate a documentation file for each class and module

entries.name: generate_file_files()
entries.desc: Generate a documentation file for each file

entries.name: generate_index()
entries.desc: Generate an index page which lists all the classes which are documented.

entries.name: generate_page(file)
entries.desc: Generate a page file for file

entries.name: generate_servlet_not_found(message)
entries.desc: Generates the 404 page for the RDoc servlet

entries.name: generate_servlet_root(installed)
entries.desc: Generates the servlet root page for the RDoc servlet

entries.name: generate_table_of_contents()
entries.desc: Generate an index page which lists all the classes which are documented.

entries.name: get_sorted_module_list(classes)
entries.desc: Return a list of the documented modules sorted by salience first, then by name.

entries.name: get_svninfo(klass)
entries.desc: Try to extract Subversion information out of the first constant whose value looks like a subversion Id tag. If no matching constant is found, and empty hash is returned.

entries.name: render(file_name)
entries.desc: Renders the ERb contained in file_name relative to the template directory and returns the result based on the current context.

entries.name: render_template(template_file, out_file = nil)
entries.desc: Load and render the erb template in the given template_file and write it out to out_file.

entries.name: setup()
entries.desc: Prepares for generation of output from the current directory

entries.name: template_for(file, page = true, klass = ERB)
entries.desc: Retrieves a cache template for file, if present, or fills the cache.

entries.name: template_result(template, context, template_file)
entries.desc: Creates the result for template with context.  If an error is raised a Pathname template_file will indicate the file where the error occurred.

entries.name: time_delta_string(seconds)
entries.desc: Return a string describing the amount of time in the given number of seconds in terms a human can understand easily.

entries.name: write_style_sheet()
entries.desc: Copy over the stylesheet into the appropriate place in the output directory.
